org.dgfoundation.amp.ar

Class CommitmentGapCellGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.SyntheticCellGenerator
      • org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.CommitmentGapCellGenerator

  • public class CommitmentGapCellGenerator
extends SyntheticCellGenerator
    the generator which will generate Commitment Gap cells each Actual Pledge ap cell will get a companion Commitment Gap cell equaling (total_actual_pledged(pledge) - total_committed(pledge)) * (ap(pledge) / total_actual_pledged(pledge))

      generate a new column where "commitment gap" = 1 * PLEDGE + (-1) * ACTUAL COMMITMENT
